params.name: course_id
params.desc: course id

params.name: search_term
params.desc: The partial title of the assignments to match and return.

params.name: order_by
params.desc: Determines the order of the assignments. Defaults to “position”. position|name|due_date

guide: Select an empty cell to start
Select the range of the params names and values

params.name: course_id
params.desc: course id

params.name: assignment_id
params.desc: assignment id

guide: Select an empty cell to start
Select the range of the params names and values

params.name: course_id
params.desc: course id

params.name: assignment_id
params.desc: assignment id

params.name: assignment_override[title]
params.desc: The title of the adhoc assignment override. Required if student_ids is present, ignored otherwise (the title is set to the name of the targetted group or section instead).

params.name: assignment_override[lock_at]
params.desc: The day/time the overridden assignment becomes locked. Accepts times in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2014-10-21T18:48:00Z. If absent, this override will not affect the lock date. May be present but null to indicate the override removes any previous lock date.

params.name: assignment_override[due_at]
params.default_value: The day/time the overridden assignment is due. Accepts times in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2014-10-21T18:48:00Z. If absent, this override will not affect due date. May be present but null to indicate the override removes any previous due date.
params.desc: due date of the override

params.name: assignment_override[unlock_at]
params.desc: The day/time the overridden assignment becomes unlocked. Accepts times in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2014-10-21T18:48:00Z. If absent, this override will not affect the unlock date. May be present but null to indicate the override removes any previous unlock date.

params.name: assignment_override[student_ids][]
params.desc: The IDs of the override's target students. One student per row. If present, the IDs must each identify a user with an active student enrollment in the course that is not already targetted by a different adhoc override.

params.name: assignment_override[title]

params.name: assignment_override[lock_at]
params.desc: The day/time the overridden assignment becomes locked. Accepts times in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2014-10-21T18:48:00Z. If absent, this override will not affect the lock date. May be present but null to indicate the override removes any previous lock date.

params.name: assignment_override[due_at]
params.default_value: The day/time the overridden assignment is due. Accepts times in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2014-10-21T18:48:00Z. If absent, this override will not affect due date. May be present but null to indicate the override removes any previous due date.
params.desc: due date of the override

params.name: assignment_override[unlock_at]
params.desc: The day/time the overridden assignment becomes unlocked. Accepts times in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2014-10-21T18:48:00Z. If absent, this override will not affect the unlock date. May be present but null to indicate the override removes any previous unlock date.

params.name: assignment_override[student_ids][]
params.desc: The IDs of the override's target students. One student per row. If present, the IDs must each identify a user with an active student enrollment in the course that is not already targetted by a different adhoc override.

params.name: account_id
params.desc: account id

guide: Select an empty cell to start
Select the range of the params names and values

params.name: account_id
params.desc: account id

params.name: search_term
params.desc: The partial course name, code, or full ID to match and return in the results list. Must be at least 3 characters.

params.name: search_by
params.desc: The filter to search by. course|teacher. “course” searches for course names, course codes, and SIS IDs. “teacher” searches for teacher names

params.name: blueprint
params.desc: If true, include only blueprint courses. If false, exclude them. If not present, do not filter on this basis.

guide: Select a cell with a course id
Select an empty cell to start
Select the range of the params names and values

template.course_ids_to_add desc: The course id that need to be associated to the blueprint course. Leave it empty if n/a
template.course_ids_to_remove desc: The course id that need to be unassociated to the blueprint course. Leave it empty if n/a

guide: Select an empty cell to start
Select the range of the params names and values

template.comment desc: An optional comment to be included in the sync history.
template.send_notification desc: Send a notification to the calling user when the sync completes, allowed values: true|false
template.copy_settings desc: Whether course settings should be copied over to associated courses. Defaults to true for newly associated courses, allowed values: true|false
template.publish_after_initial_sync desc: If set, newly associated courses will be automatically published after the sync completes, allowed values: true|false
